title: Until the Soul of the Fallen Queen Knows Love
summary:
Liaris has been mistreated as an 'incompetent person by everyone,including her family,all her life
But one day,she awakened her psychic powers,along with the memory of her previous life as a
queen.'If people were to find out about this power,they'll use me as they did in my previous life,
and I'll have an unhappy future again."Thinking this,Liaris decided to hide her ability and live
quietly as a helpless daughter.But when Edward,the sixth prince,learns of her secret,he asks her
to become his fiancee.Once more,Liaris is taken to the stage of the throne succession that will
shake the country.A romance fantasy about a strong daughter who wants to live quietly in a
peaceful world,and a lonely prince who wants to change the discriminatory world brought about
by his unusual powers.

title: I Won’t Forgive My Stepsister This Time Around!
Your Majesty, I Will Raise Him This Time!
summary: "Who would have thought that the day would come when I would be killed by my own son..." Empress Dahlia of the Empire is killed by her son’s rebellion. Dahlia, who has been kept in the dark finds it difficult to comprehend the drastic change of her son. "I’ll accept any punishment. Please, give me one more chance to face that child...!" Dahlia, having turned back time, need to face her strict husband, Klaus, in order to restore their already severed parent-child relationship. Can she use this opportunity to redo the parenting and avoid the worst future?

title: Reincarnation Of The Heavenly Demon
summary:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)

title: The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: My Body Has Been Possessed By Someone
summary: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: Honey, I Think That’s a Misunderstanding
summary: A noblewoman preparing for a political marriage keeps fainting in terror whenever she meets her intimidating fiancé—but he mistakes her fear for affection. Determined to call off the engagement, she must navigate his unexpected romanticism and family secrets.

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Upon opening my eyes after a bus accident, I found myself in the fantasy world of a web novel I enjoyed reading… the only catch is, I reincarnated twenty years before the novel begins! Reborn as Princess Yerenica of the small Lebovny kingdom, I'm determined to change the future in order to prevent the series of unfortunate events that will soon occur. In the original story, my older sister, Tejavia, is pregnant with the future female lead, when she's suddenly kidnapped by the Belgoat Empire's emperor. But in my desperate attempts to protect her, I got kidnapped instead! And as if that wasn't bad enough, my body is ridiculously weak to magic. But… strangely enough, whenever I'm by the emperor, I feel fine! The only way to save the emperor, who's destined to die at the hands of his own son after marrying the villainess, and save myself from being afflicted by magic… is for us to marry!  
  
"Marry me, Father."  
  
"'Father?' Princess, I haven't married yet, nor do I have any kids…"  


---

title: The Stars And I
summary:
Louise is a noble lady who loves books and magic devices. One day, she suddenly had her fiancé stolen by the very same twin sister she was acting as. After her dream to be a magic device researcher was destroyed, the one to save her was her first love, the First Prince Lucius, whom she was able to meet again! From a book club in a secret library to outings to magic device shops, Louise manages to regain the light in her eyes with the time they spend together. With her feeling her heart beat from Lucius's sweet words, just when you'd think they'd get together in no time, the past that the 'substitute lady' doesn't want to be known becomes an obstacle. 

“What do you think about this?”
(No... I couldn't possibly tell him about that.)

On the other hand, Louise’s potential as a researcher is also starting to bloom...?

---
Louise, a noble lady who loves reading and researching magic tools, leads a double life pretending to be her twin sister. Suddenly one day, her fiancé breaks off their engagement and chooses to be with her sister instead. All seems lost to her when she also has to give up her dream of becoming a magic tool researcher, but a reunion with her first love, the first prince Lucius, saves her from her misery. As they spend time together reading books in the hidden archives and looking around at different magic tool shops, Louise slowly regains her confidence. On top of that, her heart flutters every time unconsciously sweet words leave the prince's mouth. The mood is perfect and it seems like it's seconds before they can finally be together, but the past she wants to keep hidden gets in the way.

"How...do you feel about me?"
(He asks, but... I can't do it. I can't tell him.)

Meanwhile, her potential as a researcher begins to blossom and leads to... A true love fantasy full of misunderstandings between a magic tool-obsessed noble lady and a stoic older prince awaits!

title: A Love Hate Chord
summary:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: I Became the Adopted Daughter of the Sea Guardian
I Became a Miserable Extra in a Healing-Genre Novel
The Nerd Turned Out to Be the Tyrant
summary: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!

title: Look-Alike Daughter
summary: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

title: Living As A Madman’s Sweet Wife
summary: [Original Web Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3629814)

title: The Duke’s Daughter Will Not Forgive Anymore
The Beastly Count After Dark
summary:
One day, veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. 

After Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. 

From Let's Become a Novelist! comes the long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!

(Source: Bookwalker)

title: The Law of Hunting for the Immortal King
summary: Five years ago, the male protagonist’s brother defeated the hidden boss subspecies of the fairy king in the game “The World of the Immortal King”, and then disappeared from the world. When the family gave up looking for his brother, it was only five years for the male protagonist to realize that all this might be related to the game, and for five years, he insisted on

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
summary: Kanae Yano, a 28-year-old single woman with no boyfriend, is suddenly summoned to another world. There, she encounters Rita Scryne, the duke's daughter who looks exactly like her, and Rita's father, Zack. They ask her to take Rita's place in an arranged marriage with the ruthless and feared King Eugene Astaroth—known as the "Merciless Wolf." Upon learning that the summoning magic can bring people from another world but cannot send them back, Kanae finds herself with no choice but to accept. However, when she meets King Eugene, she makes a shocking discovery—his true identity is none other than her first love!

title: The Cursed Princess Must Rewind the Clock
Until the Real One Shows Up
summary: Once bitten, twice shy. That is Anastasia's motto when she awakes with a second chance in life as the Empress in her favorite novel. After realizing that even true love cannot change destiny, Anastasia attempts to help her husband, the Emperor, find his happy ending with the female protagonist--the true heroine of the story. However, it seems that the Emperor has other thoughts. She pushes him away so they can both live, but the Emperor is unsure if he wants to live without his queen.

title: Let Me Kidnap the Male Lead!
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel that I think I read sometime in the past. In the not far future, I'm fated to become the fiancée of the villain, but that's well... Won't it change following the way that I live?

"My ideal type is a man who is 190 cm, handsome, rich, has a rank at least above a Count, and won't grow a gut even when they get old!"

But before I could even find a husband I saved the life of the young male lead? After that my plan for an easy life kept getting messed up!

"I'm sorry, but Ariel said that she can't take her eyes off me because I'm the prettiest and handsomest person in the world."

"What? I did?"

"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!"

"Hold on! No! Wait!"

---
[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)

title: The Princess in The Henhouse
summary: No summary available.

title: Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: Prison Love
summary: A weary office worker, drained by the demands of a black company, finds his monotonous life taking an unexpected turn. One day, mistaking a plastic bag caught on a utility pole for a cat, he leans over his balcony to investigate. His concerned neighbor, misinterpreting his actions as a suicide attempt, intervenes dramatically. Upon regaining consciousness, he discovers he's been bound and confined in her apartment. The neighbor, exhibiting obsessive affection, declares, "You're safe now... I'll take care of you forever."

title: Loving Summer Sky
summary: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: The regressor only protects me
summary:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

title: I Became the Rabbit Heroine’s Stepmother
summary: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won’t be easy, but she has help. The World Tree’s butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.

title: Emotional Transference
summary: Su-a, a college freshman in Creative Writing, struggles to understand and express her emotions, leaving her isolated from those around her. When she meets Taeyang, a second-year Sports Coaching student who can sense emotions through touch, their unexpected connection sparks a journey of discovery. Paired for a class assignment that involves a "date," their bond deepens. This is a story about a man who feels too much and a woman who feels too little, and their journey toward emotional growth.

title: Marriage Blues
summary: On her wedding day, Hana Gu realizes her relationship lacks love and flees the ceremony. During her escapade, she runs into her ex-boyfriend, Gawi Nam who helps her by using his mysterious ability to time travel into the past. Determined to erase her unwanted marriage, she uses this ability to try and change her fate, but the future proves less malleable than expected. Amid repeated failures, she finds solace in Gawi, who is also trapped in the past, facing similar struggles. As they fight fate together, old feelings from their first love resurface, making Hana question -- does she truly want to change her fate?

title: Wedding Strategy
summary: No summary available.

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”

title: Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Deeply In Love
summary:
Because of a heartbreak in her past, Kirino decided to live more for her idol than for actual boys, but one day, transfer student Kametani-kun comes, who has a somewhat similar vibe to her idol! When Kametani-kun glares at the girls saying, “Don’t even think about talking to me!” on the very first day of transferring to the school, Kirino gets intrigued by him and learns his secret and…?!

(Source: K Manga)

title: I Ran Away From The Hunter
Would You Like to Have an Affair With Me
The Promise Isn’t Mine
summary:
"Kill me, as you promised." 

When her twin sister Leyla, the Holy Maiden, suddenly disappears one day, the ordinary Elena finds herself having to marry Crown Prince Kyle, a man infamous for his ruthlessness, in her stead. After a dreadful marriage ceremony, Kyle demands that a certain promise be fulfilled, to Elena’s confusion.

title: Crash On Paradise
summary: Anze, the daughter of a duke, is forced to marry Aiden, the illegitimate son of the Emperor, at the Emperor's behest. After an uneasy first meeting, they arrive at Aiden's home in the countryside, where they grow up together.

title: Doctor, Go to Joseon
summary:
"Is this really Joseon?! But I still have lives to save!"

Baek Kang-hyuk, South Korea’s top genius surgeon, finds himself transported to the Joseon era after touching a mysterious painting. And of all times… right before the outbreak of the Imjin War!

title: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset
summary:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fucking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?

title: Daddy President Is Too Hard To Deal With
summary: Rumor has it that the president of the Xi group is weird, unpredictable, insidious and mean of doing things but he spoils her to the maximum. Assistant: “Sir, Madam’s hospital has been smashed.” “Where is madam?” “Madam is about to cripple someone …….” “Let the doctor go to madam to see if her hand hurts from the beating! Love rivals from all over the world: “Xiao Tian Tian, what’s so great about a cold old man! Come with me and I’ll give you everything. President Xi: “Wife,the babies are calling you home for dinner.”

title: My bias gets on the last train
summary:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

title: I’m the strongest boss
summary:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training… by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"…?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
It’s Okay to Be Left Out
summary: Our company is pleasing to the eye! From the gentle team leader to the handsome CEO! However, I made a ridiculous mistake at the new employee welcome party. The wonderful team leader until yesterday is starting to turn away from me... I can't put an end to my love for the team leader like this! I was going straight and going straight until you accepted my virtue... But can someone tell me why this becomes a love affair and not a virtue?
